com.mapbox.services.android.telemetry.location

Class LostLocationEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.telemetry.location.LocationEngine
      • com.mapbox.services.android.telemetry.location.LostLocationEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.mapzen.android.lost.api.LocationListener

    public class LostLocationEngine
extends LocationEngine
implements com.mapzen.android.lost.api.LocationListener
    Sample LocationEngine using the Open Source Lost library

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate()
      Activate the location engine which will connect whichever location provider you are using.
      void deactivate()
      Disconnect the location engine which is useful when you no longer need location updates or requesting the users LocationEngine.getLastLocation().
      Location getLastLocation()
      Returns the Last known location if the location provider is connected and location permissions are granted.

      Check if your location provider has been activated/connected.

      Invoked when the Location has changed.

      Dismiss ongoing location update to the location provider.

    • Method Detail

      • getLocationEngine

        public static LocationEngine getLocationEngine(Context context)

      • activate

        public void activate()
        Activate the location engine which will connect whichever location provider you are using. You'll need to call this before requesting user location updates using LocationEngine.requestLocationUpdates().
        Specified by:
        activate in class LocationEngine

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate()
        Disconnect the location engine which is useful when you no longer need location updates or requesting the users LocationEngine.getLastLocation(). Before deactivating, you'll need to stop request user location updates using LocationEngine.removeLocationUpdates().
        Specified by:
        deactivate in class LocationEngine

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Check if your location provider has been activated/connected. This is mainly used internally but is also useful in the rare case when you'd like to know if your location engine is connected or not.
        Specified by:
        isConnected in class LocationEngine
        Returns:
        boolean true if the location engine has been activated/connected, else false.

      • getLastLocation

        @Nullable
public Location getLastLocation()
        Returns the Last known location if the location provider is connected and location permissions are granted.
        Specified by:
        getLastLocation in class LocationEngine
        Returns:
        the last known location

      • requestLocationUpdates

        public void requestLocationUpdates()
        Request location updates to the location provider.
        Specified by:
        requestLocationUpdates in class LocationEngine

      • obtainType

        public LocationEngine.Type obtainType()
        Specified by:
        obtainType in class LocationEngine

      • removeLocationUpdates

        public void removeLocationUpdates()
        Dismiss ongoing location update to the location provider.
        Specified by:
        removeLocationUpdates in class LocationEngine

      • onLocationChanged

        public void onLocationChanged(Location location)
        Invoked when the Location has changed.
        Specified by:
        onLocationChanged in interface com.mapzen.android.lost.api.LocationListener
        Parameters:
        location - the new location
